ygData.subject: Re: Greetings and Salutations
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I guess it s time i should introduce myself. My char name is Saleen, i m currently a Lvl 16 High Elf Wiz on the Xegony server. I run this list and the
ygData.messageBody:
Well I guess it's time i should introduce myself. My char name is Saleen, i'm
currently a Lvl 16 High Elf Wiz
on the Xegony server. I run this list and the EQ_Xegony list.

As most of you know by now this list is NOT moderated.
So a couple of things i would like to ask of the community when posting to this
list.

1) Please keep the language clean.
2) NO question is a dumb question so please don't flame or harrass people that
ask questions which you might feel is stupid.
3) Some people consider posting information about Quest's , unique items etc..
to be Spoilers. So to respect the rights of those
people, if you should send in anything that is or may be considered a Spoiler
please add **Spoiler** to the subject so that anyone
who doesn't want to read information on Spoilers can just delete the mail.

That's pretty much it. Have fun and let me know if there is anything i can do
to help you enjoy your stay more in this community.



At 01:34 PM 4/16/99 -0400, you wrote:
>
> Hello all. As welcomes seem to be the order of the day, I will add mine =
> to the list. I am Shadowwalker, High Elf Wizard on the Karana server, =
> currently at level 11. I have been spending time around the Steamfont =
> Mino cave with my guild, though we recently went exploring a bit in =
> Dagnot's Cauldron, which is intimidating to say the least. Really neat =
> looking though. We also spend time in Butcherblock and Lesser Faydark =
> occationally as well.
>
> I do have a question in case someone here knows. Does anyone know of =
> quests in Faydwer that can be taken on, besides the wolf pelt one?
>
> -Shadowwalker of Karana



-------------------------------------------------
Saleen : High Elf Wizard - Xegony
saleengt@...
